title: Impact
description: On the way to a space colony, a crisis sends the Robinsons hurtling towards an unfamiliar planet, where they struggle to survive a harrowing night.

title: Diamonds in the Sky
description: Another crash brings more travelers to the planet, as the Robinsons work to salvage their ship with help from their mysterious new companion.

title: Infestation
description: Flashbacks reveal clues to Dr. Smith's past; The Robinsons contend with a new threat as the ship's fuel supply starts dropping - fast.

title: The Robinsons Were Here
description: The Robinsons make contact with another family of survivors; Will races to protect his friend after Judy learns what happened aboard the Resolute.

title: Transmission
description: As the team builds a tower to signal the Resolute, Maureen investigates a planetary anomaly, and Will braces for a tough conversation with his dad.

title: Eulogy
description: Maureen debates whether to share what she saw in the sky, Don leads a mission to find fuel, and the robot's presence stokes tensions within the group.

title: Pressurized
description: Judy and Don race home across the desert with their precious cargo. John and Maureen are dealt a heavy blow. Penny does her best to comfort Will.

title: Trajectory
description: Maureen finds a solution to the fuel issue, but putting her plan into action proves trickier than expected. Dr. Smith realizes her cover is blown.

title: Resurrection
description: Judy sets out to find Maureen, while Will and Penny lead an expedition to the caves. Dr. Smith pursues a new escape plan.

title: Danger, Will Robinson
description: The Robinson family scrambles to launch from the Lost Planet, stage an impossible rescue, and reach the Resolute before it leaves orbit for good. Unfortunately, some have other plans.
